text: Featherstone Bridge is a stone arch bridge across the River South Tyne at Featherstone in Northumberland. ==History== This structure is a stone arch bridge completed in 1775. It is a Grade II* listed structure. There is a plaque above the keystone on inner face of the west parapet displaying the name of the bridge. ==References== Category:Bridges in Northumberland Category:Crossings of the River Tyne Category:Grade II* listed buildings in Northumberland
title: Featherstone Bridge
